entry.title: Blame it on luck and vain
entry.summary:
Author: strawberry3lemonade

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 489Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Reader, an aspiring woman, moves to Gotham, as the city keeps its attempts to rebuild itself, to pursue her independence goals by turning herself into a 'big city girl'. Starting out as a photographer for an extravagant art exhibit hosted by the Wayne family, she quickly perceives that this is a cover up for... something she, as a newcomer, cannot yet name. After not being able to stop herself from enjoying all the rose wine, her drunk mind decides to explore around the manor. After all this girl was someone who just broke her chains, off to a fresh start hunting for novelty. She has heard rumours about this city and its people. And the need to know more, to include herself in this city, doubles when she is caught throwing up in the garden maze of Wayne manor, the Damian Wayne himself. The image of those green eyes are carved into her memory, and she is the artist with she way she chose to remember him.The story includes original characters and other DCU characters, and I hope to provide a solid plot about how the reader (MC) and Damian grow closer to one another. Different POVs used, mainly Damian's and reader's. This is my first ever work, I hope to make this an enjoyable read! I am a bit nervous too, haha. Thank you!

entry.title: I've Been The Archer, I've Been The Prey
entry.summary:
Author: Totallynotashieldagent

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,272Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 956

Summary: Reader's father and Bruce arranged for her and Damian to marry. However, before Reader's father could truly sit and explain to her his decision he passed away. And Damian never thought to question his father's decision at all.Reader's mother only saw dollar signs for this arrangement and forced it to happen much quicker than ever anticipated. Now it's just two strangers that have been forced together and trying to navigate the expectations of becoming the new IT couple of Gotham while trying to keep their secrets under wraps as Reader learns what it means to be the new Wayne Matriarch since the death of Martha Wayne.

entry.title: Up For Studying
entry.summary:
Author: anastasia1513

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,488Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

Summary: It‚Äôs been three weeks. Three incredible, dizzying weeks of being Damian Wayne‚Äôs girlfriend. Three weeks of stolen kisses between classes, of holding hands under the lunch table, of late-night phone calls that stretch into the early morning. He‚Äôs everything you never knew you wanted: intense, brilliant, fiercely loyal, and surprisingly gentle with you. You‚Äôre ready for more. The thought has been simmering for days, a low, persistent hum of desire beneath the surface of your daily life. You want to know what it feels like to be truly his, to cross that final threshold. You want to see that legendary composure finally shatter. And you have a plan.

entry.title: Beware the Nightmares on the Land and Sea
entry.summary:
Author: HotaruKurosawa

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 104,821Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 73

Summary: One day, your life took a turn. For better or worse, you haven't decided yet. What you do know is that there are things on this planet that you never even knew existed. Things that your mind could never even imagine. Yet, here you are. Now, you must rebuild your life whilst trying to navigate this new one involving heroes and villains alike. Not to mention navigating the normal world and the magic one, as you possess a power that others could only dream of having. Whilst you are uncertain of how to navigate these changes in your life, these few things are certain. Don't go into the water past your knees.If you saw something that seemed abnormal, no you didn't.If you hear voices in your head, it will pass. Don't fully trust their advice.No matter what you do with your life, remember, it's not just yours that hangs in the balance.And lastly, whatever you do, don't have sex. These are the things you have to follow by to get through this life. If you don't, it won't be just you who deals with the consequences. Oh, and don't forget. The Eldritch Being inside of your chest is watching everything you do. Try not to disappoint her. Your Choices Matter.

entry.title: People Aren't Good
entry.summary:
Author: Miss_nightshade

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,573Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 65

Summary: Hecate has spent her life tucked into the bruised edges of Gotham‚Äôs Narrows, pretending to be a small, harmless girl with nothing worth noticing. It‚Äôs a fragile lie, but it holds. She goes to school. She walks home alone. She returns to a house that feels older than she is, a place that hums with magic she refuses to touch. She keeps her power buried. She ignores the ancient voices whispering inside her. She does everything she can to stay unseen. And for years, it works. Until the night it doesn‚Äôt.

entry.title: good practice
entry.summary:
Author: justiceiscalling

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,936Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 58

Summary: You cut the thread once the last stitch is complete, leaning back to view your work. It looked clean. Slightly puffy but holding well. ‚ÄúOkay.‚Äù You pull your hands off. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre done.‚Äù It takes a moment before he says anything. You think that maybe he too is admiring your work but when you drag your eyes up to his he is watching you. ‚ÄúI appreciate it.‚Äù ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt mention it.‚Äù ‚ÄúNo.‚Äù He says, dismissing your attempt to brush this off. ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt brush it off. I appreciate this. I know I‚Ä¶‚Äù He trails off. You wish he didn‚Äôt. You wonder where he was going with that. He clears his throat quietly. ‚ÄúThis isn‚Äôt a regular occurrence.‚Äù ‚Äî You stitch up your roommate one night. You had never realized stitching someone‚Äôs wounds could make you come to realization with your feelings.

Summary: Growing up as Selina Kyle‚Äôs adopted child, the reader has spent years learning how to survive Gotham‚Äôs shadows‚Äînot as a thief, but as a sharp-tongued vigilante determined to clean up the streets in their own way. Their nightly missions constantly collide with Robin‚Äôs, turning every encounter with Damian Wayne into a heated clash of pride, skill, and stubbornness. What begins as rivalry slowly shifts into tension neither of them can ignore as they uncover a conspiracy threatening Gotham, forcing them to work together. Between dangerous secrets, Selina‚Äôs warnings, and Bruce‚Äôs suspicions, the reader and Damian‚Äôs relationship turns from enemies to reluctant allies to something deeper, proving that even in Gotham‚Äôs darkest corners, love can strike like a lucky hit.

entry.title: Summer's Embrace
entry.summary:
Author: MrsRogersBarnes1008

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,621Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 26

Summary: Every summer, the Kent and Wayne families gather for a tradition that‚Äôs equal parts chaos, comfort, and cosmic-level awkwardness. As the daughter of Superman, you‚Äôve grown up juggling chores, school, and the occasional accidental super-strength mishap ‚Äî but nothing prepares you for Damian Wayne: sharp-tongued, battle-trained, and determined to keep everyone at arm‚Äôs length. From childhood rivalries to late-night conversations in barns and on rooftops, your connection with him shifts in ways neither of you expect. Across years, cities, and clashing legacies ‚Äî Kryptonian and human, assassin and hero ‚Äî the two of you learn that growing up means confronting the shadows you inherit and the light you choose. A slow-burn story of summers, letters, family, and the long, messy path from antagonism to something much more. Expect: batbrother chaos, Smallville softness, Gotham sharp edges, lots of feelings, and two stubborn teens fighting the world ‚Äî and their own hearts ‚Äî every step of the way. P.S. This is my first story I am posting, so please be kind! Rude comments will not be tolerated.
